text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse My family was wondering when will get the 2 nd stimulus package and are our schools are they safe to reopen with the covid-19 i have 4 children and i can not replace them they are my everything so is my husband he drives the school bus so please talk to us we need to know
